Indicate most recent tax year 1996 (year) Sponsor's income $ or Sponsor and spouse's combined income $ 105,844-00 (If filing joint tax return) Income of other persons in household who will make their Income available (list names; include spouse if heishe filed a separate tax return) $ $ $ Total $ E plain if you or any of the above listed individuals are submitting income tax returns for fewer than 3 years, or if other explanation of income or evidence is necessary. E. Determination of Eligibility Based on Income 1. [j I am subject to the 100 percent of poverty line requirement for sponsors on active duty in the U.S. Armed Forces sponsoring a spouse and/or child. All others use 125 percent. 2. Number of dependents from Part 4.C., line 5 3. Minimum income requirement from the Poverty Guidelines chart is $ for this number of dependents. isular or immigration officer will review your ability to maintain income based on your current employment and Federal tax returns for the past 3 years. If your total household Income from Part 4. D. is equal 10 or higher than the poverty line for the number of dependents In Part 4. C.. and your current employment demonstrates your ability to support the sponsored iminigrant(s), you are not required to list assets in Part 4. F. You may skip to Part 7. If your total household Income form Part 1. D. is below the poverty line for the number of dependents in Part 4. C., you and/or the sponsored allen(s) may submit evidence of assets, or a Joint sponsor may execute a separate allidavis of support. (See Part 4. F., Part S. and Part 6.)
